results.title: The Third note
results.creator_credit: Lynne Vincent McCarthy, Priscilla Collins, Catriona McKenzie and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
A blind woman and her Russian neighbour do battle with sound and music when he refuses to read a postcard for her. What starts as war ends in understanding.
Cast: Deborah Mailman, Leonid Dobrinski

Cast: Deborah Mailman, Leonid Dobrinski

results.title: Grey
results.creator_credit: Kelly Schilling, Joe Weatherstone, Steven McGregor and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Aboriginal couple Annika and Randle have very different ideas on how to approach the Sydney Harbour Bridge reconciliation march between black and white Australians. Annika thinks that they should be up there on that bridge showing their support while Randle prefers to show his support on a smaller, more personal scale.
After the march a white woman collapses and, while Randle is off calling for an ambulance, Annika stays with the woman. It is here that she is forced to confront her own prejudice and ultimately acknowledge that she just may be one of the biggest hypocrites of all.
Cast: Janine Matthews, Laurence Clifford, Victoria Longley
results.creator_credit_for_label: Kelly Schilling, Joe Weatherstone, Steven McGregor and AFTRS

results.title: You dust mite be next
results.creator_credit: Darlene Johnson, Chris Aronsten, Kate Reidl, Jane Keneally and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A docudrama about the evil little dust mite that plagues the world using up close and personal microscopic images, horror tales from victims and a biology lesson from experts Dr Ewan Tovey and Michael Morris.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Darlene Johnson, Chris Aronsten, Kate Reidl, Jane Keneally and AFTRS

results.title: Redreaming the dark
results.creator_credit: Romaine Moreton, Charlotte Seymour, Erica Glynn and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
During an electricity blackout in the family apartment, a young intellectually challenged Black woman has her life suddenly thrown into turmoil. Her grandmother soothes the young girl, teaching her not only to embrace the dark but also to love her dark self. Together the three women “redream” the dark.
Cast: Emily Walker, Leah Purcell, Irma Woods
results.creator_credit_for_label: Romaine Moreton, Charlotte Seymour, Erica Glynn and AFTRS

results.title: Redfern Beach
results.creator_credit: Rachel Roberts, Catriona McKenzie and AFTRS
results.brief_description:
Max needs to choose between money and love. An old bagman gives Max a magic fishing lure. As colour begins to seep into his life, the choice becomes clear.
Cast features Michael Tuahine, Phaedra Nicolaidis, Nicholas Papademetriou and Tony Barry.

results.title: Warm strangers
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Melanie Coombs and Ivan Sen
results.brief_description: At the end of his journey, Jess attempts to reunite with his father whom he has not seen for years. Powerful short from the director of ‘Beneath Clouds’ (2002), Produced by Melanie Coombs (‘Harvey Krumpet’). Original format 16mm/black and white.

results.title: The Watchers
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Cath Moore, Joe Weatherstone and Steven McGregor
results.brief_description: In a world where all our desires are monitored, a teenage boy is inspired to cross the line. But The Watchers are out and they show him where his actions may lead. Cast: Wayne Pygram, Dane Sheddon, Nathaniel Dean, Wayne Blair. 35mm live action footage with digital effects created on SGI, Mac and PC. Original format 35 mm/colour.

results.title: Two bob mermaid
results.creator_credit: Darlene Johnson, Antonia Barnard and Core Films
results.brief_description: In this visually stunning short film set in the 1950s, a fair-skinned Aboriginal girl gains access to the local swimming pool where Aboriginal people are legally denied access (Source: Australian Screen)

results.title: Round up
results.brief_description: Round Up follows the journey of two country boys who find themselves out of place in the hustle and bustle of the big city. Here in this unfamiliar environment, they may learn that they are not as different as they first thought.
results.description: Round Up follows the journey of two country boys who find themselves out of place in the hustle and bustle of the big city. Here in this unfamiliar environment, they may learn that they are not as different as they first thought.
